name: Heroic RPG Clicker
description:
1. The Attack button causes damage to the monster and gives your experience points.

2. After a certain amount of experience points you level up and can cause more damage with your attacks. Experience points reset to 0 after a level-up.

3. Every 4 Level-ups you unlock the magic button that increases the automagic attacks.

5. Killing monsters gives you gold. After a certain amount of gold, the button upgrade unlocks allowing you to increase attack strength.

6. The higher lever your reach the stronger monsters you have to fight.
